page_content:
Poland
Katalyst Education
Katalyst Education is a Polish organization based in Warsaw. Since 2015, they 
have been developing free educational resources for teachers and students. Akamai’s grant to Katalyst Education is allowing them to continue their work around production of self directed study materials focused on engineering.Social / Foundation / 04 Foundation Grants
The Katalyst Education Team -  Provided by Anna Stokowska, Team Leader & 
Project Manager for Katalyst Education 
From the very beginning, our video lessons are designed to level 
the playing field in education: They are free, we publish them under Creative Common licenses, and most importantly — thanks to the fact that they are created by teachers and 100% adapted to the core curriculum — they are primarily used to be able to make up at home for the material covered in school. In addition, for over half a year, all our films have Ukrainian subtitles so that children with refugee experience who found themselves in Poland after the outbreak of the war in Ukraine could participate in Polish education.
 
Anna Stokowska Team Manager for Katalyst Education 
74
